text: Kawom geuh teuka keunan le bagah Meusenoh-seunoh jijak bak gopnyan Cit ka dilee kon jipubuet salah Teuma Luth geukheun wahe kawomlon Aneuk daralon dum ceudah-ceudah Bandum jih suci lonbri keu gata Teuma takwa gata keu Allah Bek tapeuÊ»ayeb lon bak jameilon Peue hana kawom gata nyang ceudah Peue hana gata nyang got pikiran
